name: @rocket-sensei/activeadmin_trumbowyg
description: Trumbowyg WYSIWYG editor integration for ActiveAdmin 4
author: Mattia Roccoberton <mat@blocknot.es> (Original), Gleb Tv <glebtv@gmail.com> (ActiveAdmin 4 port)

scripts.prepare_javascripts_src: rm -rf src && cp -R app/assets/javascripts/ src && mv src/activeadmin_trumbowyg.js src/activeadmin_trumbowyg.js.tmp && mv src/active_admin/trumbowyg.esm.js src/activeadmin_trumbowyg.js && rm src/activeadmin_trumbowyg.js.tmp
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run prepare_javascripts_src && npm run prepare_stylesheets_src
